templates.name: Sales Collection
templates.content: You can take a look at our sale collection here: https://weesqueak.com/collections/sale

templates.name: Brand ambassador / sponsorship
templates.content: The best way to discuss this is to email us directly at support@weesqueak.com. Our team is happy to chat.

templates.name: Free Shipping
templates.content: We offer free shipping on domestic orders over $100. Maybe you can add something to reach the min?

templates.name: Do your shoes run wide/narrow?
templates.content: The width will vary slightly depending on the style of shoe/sole. Most of our shoes do tend to run on the wider side with exception of the tennis shoes.

templates.name: Sizing
templates.content: You can check out our size chart here: https://weesqueak.com/pages/sizing-chart?externalId=TDr-T Or print out a measuring chart to help you find the perfect size: https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0264/5959/files/WS_sizechart.pdf?604=&externalId=TDr-T let me know if you're still unsure!

templates.name: Shipping time
templates.content: All online orders can take up to 3-7 business days from the date an order is placed, although Canada orders can take longer.

templates.name: How long do the squeakers/squeaker plugs last?
templates.content: The squeaker plugs should last the life of the shoe. We don't recommend the shoes be submerged in water or sand, and it's worth mentioning that some customers actually do choose to purchase additional replacement squeakers in the case they were to lose them when switching out the silent plugs/squeaker plugs.

templates.name: Social Media
templates.content: Give us a follow on IG: https://www.instagram.com/weesqueak/ and FB here: https://www.facebook.com/weesqueakshoes

templates.name: Phone support
templates.content: You can give us a call at +1 334-400-9832 or let me know if I can help via text, it may be faster.

templates.name: Military / First responder / Healthcare / Teacher discount
templates.content: Thank you for your service! We don't have any specific discounts like that but if it helps, you can check out the items we have on sale here: https://weesqueak.com/collections/sale

templates.name: Customer support
templates.content: The best way to handle this is to email us directly at support@weesqueak.com. Our team is happy to help!

templates.name: Store location / retailer
templates.content: We don't currently have a store but definitely keep an eye out.

templates.name: Return Policy
templates.content: You can check our detailed return policy here: https://weesqueak.attn.tv/sl/87GsJZXM .

templates.name: Can the squeak be removed?
templates.content: Yes it can. To remove the squeaker, use your fingers or a pair of tweezers to simply pull out the white button located near the heel of the shoe.

templates.name: Wholesale
templates.content: The best way to discuss wholesale is to email us directly at support@weesqueak.com Our team is happy to chat. If you haven't already, be sure to apply for a wholesale account here: https://weesqueak.attn.tv/sl/4kXBR4JC

templates.name: Size Chart: Kids - Shoes
templates.content: You can take a look at our kids' size chart here: https://weesqueak.com/pages/sizing-chart

templates.name: Why don't my shoes squeak?
templates.content: Wee Squeak shoes will only sound if the child is walking in the correct heel-toe rotation. Please note that Squeaker sounds may vary. Be sure to never wear Wee Squeak shoes in sandboxes or at the beach. Sometimes the foam in the heel blocks the air from escaping the hole and prevents the squeaking. Remove the squeaker and place a ballpoint pen (or something similar) in the squeaker outlet. Push the foam towards the back of the shoe with the pen. This should fix the problem.

templates.name: Cancel / edit order
templates.content: The best way to check if you can cancel or edit your order is to email us directly at support@weesqueak.com. Our team is happy to help!
